comment: The computer labs are very well equiped and there are usually plenty computers available. I just wish there were more macs. The classrooms are ok but can get kinda hot during the summer.
This college is fantastic! The professors are top-notch, the facilities are state-of-the-art, and there are endless opportunities to get involved and grow as a student. Highly recommend!
The labs have all the equipment you need, but they can get crowded during lab sessions. The teaching assistants are helpful though.
The campus is well-maintained and clean, and the buildings are all easily accessible. There are also plenty of events and activities to get involved in.
The professors are knowledgeable and engaging, and they create a great learning environment. The only downside is that some classes can be quite challenging.
The classrooms are decent, with comfortable chairs and enough space to move around. However, some of the chalkboards are difficult to read.
